summary: A set of premade custom overlays and control options to enhance the in game lighting and tweak the visuals to your preferance.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/21642-1-1344059996.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRKHTfkp7OE][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/501-1-1344104108.png[/img][/url]
Base of the mod are premade custom lighting overlays that will apply over the vanilla game to enhance the overall lighting quality.
Once installed a custom configuration (realistic overlay + 6 color) will be automatically applied.
CLO - Customizer will be added to your inventory.
Equipping it in hand and using, gives you a menu based interface where you can change custom overlays and adjust color, contrast, bloom and other visual settings in the game.


This version of CLO will be replacing the two older ones, so if you use those feel free to uninstall them.


****COMPATIBILITY: Any mod i can think of... (translation:any mod)****
author: fLokii

files.name: CLO - Custom Lighting Overlay
files.changelogHtml: Made some adjustments to increments when changing settings. Lowered for better precision.
